title: Best of The Program |  3/16/21
description:
Pat and Stu fill in for Glenn. The Washington Post admitted it got a major Trump story wrong, two months after the damage had already been done. “Moderate” President Biden is considering the first major federal tax hike in almost 30 years. Stu and Pat discuss TV shows going back and removing episodes deemed controversial.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
